articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: India crowned Badminton Asia Team champions for 1st time as PV Sindhu, Anmol Kharb shine vs Thailand in final - India Today
articles.description: Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024 India rode on PV Sindhu and 16-year-old Anmol Kharb039s brilliance as they defeated Thailand 3-2 in a hard-fought final on Sunday in Malaysia It was the first time India won the title in the contintental tournament
articles.content: India women's badminton team scripted history on Sunday in Selangor Malaysia as they won the Badminton Asia Team Championships crown, beating Thailand 3-2 in a hard-fought final. This is the first ti… [+2794 chars]
